author: jcrtp
content: Hi guys, we're trying to deploy some test validators on Prater via smart contracts and it looks like the Beacon Chain hasn't picked them up yet - we can see the event emitted in the deposit contract on Goerli, and it looks like Prater's Eth 1 data has moved onto blocks beyond our deposits, but the validators aren't showing up in our Beacon clients yet

author: jcrtp
content: https://prater.beaconcha.in/validators/eth1deposits is showing that all of the new validators on the chain, starting with our first one, aren't being activated

author: jcrtp
content: I just want to make sure we didn't break the testnet with our deposits...

author: jcrtp
content: <@!340345049063882753> <@!553610810652622860> Do either of you have any insight? Here's the goerli TX for the first deposit: <https://goerli.etherscan.io/tx/0x52ebacc54b666a868bdb2222c6a24a2f5e893adbdbbbfac77ac1133032cab7a9>

author: ajsutton
content: Probably not great to ping random people, just give it a bit more time for people to get back to you.  In this case Prater has currently voted in block 0x0d7fd7ad4f2c6de242ecd4e82ee3f406b815009c6785507788598463c0179b0b which is 5206344 and the first unconfirmed validator deposited in block 5212284 so the deposit hasn't yet been included. I think it's on track to be included in the next voting period but I may have misread the details on that.

author: jcrtp
content: My apologies, I was advised to ask you about it

author: nishant0
content: Prater currently has a drop in participation and is at 70%

author: nishant0
content: which might be why your deposits arent being voted in

author: jcrtp
content: Ok, I'm not in a rush - I just wanted to make sure we didn't break anything

author: ajsutton
content: Each voting period seems to be reaching 50%.  The bit I'm not sure about is if they're voting for significantly old blocks or something like that in those voting periods.

author: protolambda
content: Maybe some prysm nodes on Prater that didn't update for Goerli London support? (their Go bindings had to change)

author: nishant0
content: afaik, all of our nodes are running our current release, which has the updated london bindings

author: nishant0
content: participation is still at 70%, which might be an issue here

author: jcrtp
content: I am happy to report that it is working now, we have validators up with 0x01 withdrawal credentials üëç

author: jcrtp
content: Just took ~28 hours for the deposit to process and the validators to get activated
